pull.title: break circular dependency: random/sync -> util -> random/sync
pull.body: LogPrintf  has acutally been moved to logging.h

rename.from: break circular dependency: random -> util -> random
rename.to: break circular dependency: random/sync -> util -> random/sync

events.body:
Concept ACK

Let's get rid of circular dependencies! 👍
Just nits I noticed on second look, fine to include with.

events.message: break circular dependency: random/sync -> util -> random/sync

events.body: re-utACK 84f4194 - whitespace and include ordering changes only

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -11,15 +11,16 @@
 #include <compat.h> // for Windows API
 #include <wincrypt.h>
 #endif
-#include <util.h>             // for LogPrint()
-#include <utilstrencodings.h> // for GetTime()
+#include <logging.h>          // for LogPrint()
+#include <utiltime.h>         // for GetTime()

comments.body: nit: move the stdlib includes below (as is I believe clang-format will intermix them in the sort)
